verb.description: Carry out, accomplish, or fulfill (an action, task, or function)
examples: I have my duties to perform

verb.description: Present (a form of entertainment) to an audience.
examples: the cast of 14 perform the play superbly

origin: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French parfourmer, alteration (by association with forme form) of Old French parfournir, from par through, to completion + fournir furnish, provide.
